name: @hmscore/cordova-plugin-hms-location
description: LocationKit plugin for Cordova and Ionic.

scripts.eslint: node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint www && node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint src && node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint tests
scripts.compile-ionic: PLUGIN_DIR=$(pwd); mkdir -p ../ionic-native/src/@ionic-native/plugins/hms-location; cp ionic/wrapper/index.ts ../ionic-native/src/@ionic-native/plugins/hms-location/; cd ../ionic-native; npm run build; cd "$PLUGIN_DIR"; cp ../ionic-native/dist/@ionic-native/plugins/hms-location/ ionic/dist -r

author: Huawei
